text: The ones who disbelieve will be driven along to Hell in throngs until, just as they come up to it, its gates will swing open and its keepers will say to them: "Did not messengers come to you from among yourselves reciting your LordÂ´s verses to you and warning you about meeting [Him] on this day of yours?"
